Working on adding a button with text "north East".
add a button with text north East

In the ongoing conversation, the user requested the addition of various fields, buttons, and features within an app. The user primarily instructed the AI to add fields for "charge," "Eyedrops," "zero," "tye," "neither," "neon," "teio," "Eyes," "Free," and "Forget Password." Each time, the AI acknowledged the request and confirmed it would add the specified field. 

The user was also presented with options about the placement and functionality of these fields in the app. For instance, when asked about the "charge" field, the user expressed a desire for it on the checkout page, preferring a static value displayed to all users. Other features were also suggested by the AI, including a pricing display for uniform items, payment gateway integration, notifications for payment confirmations, and a user profile section for storing preferences.

Additionally, the user indicated preferences about other features, such as integrating neon elements, adding buttons labeled "Socks," "Shirts," and "Tie's," implementing a color picker, and establishing an interactive password reset process. After each set of inquiries, the AI offered further suggestions on additional potential features, covering aspects like security measures, user customization, and ease of navigation.

The AI's responses were consistently supportive, confirming the user’s requests and integrating their feedback into the app updates as they unfolded throughout the dialogue. The interaction culminated in the AI seeking further clarification about the overall project aims to ensure accurate implementation of the requested features.
